channel.title: Drexel eLearning Podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn about Online Distance Learning at Drexel University
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Kenneth Hartman
channel.itunes:summary: Drexel eLearning podcasts are all about online distance learning. Members of the Drexel University community offer advice on finding, prepairing for and learning in an online e-Learning environment. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store.
channel.description: >Drexel eLearning podcasts are all about online distance learning. Members of the Drexel University community offer advice on finding, prepairing for and learning in an online e-Learning environment. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store.

item.title: Look Before You Leap Online: Earning Your College Degree Online - Issue 1
item.itunes:author: Kathleen McDonald, a working professional and online student at Drexel University
item.itunes:subtitle: Advice on how to succeed as an online student.
item.description: Listen to Kathleen McDonald, a working professional and online student at Drexel University, talk about her e-Learning experience and share her advice on how to succeed as an online student.

item.title: Preparation for Your First Online Course - Issue 2
item.itunes:author: Dr. Kenneth Hartman, Director of Academic Affairs at Drexel e-Learning
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Kenneth Hartman's "Tech Prep for the eLearning rookie."
item.description: Listen to Dr. Kenneth Hartman's "Tech Prep for the eLearning rookie." Dr. Hartman offers four simple steps to help new online students prepare personally and technically for their first online course.

item.title: How to Compare and Select an Online College Degree Program - Issue 3
item.itunes:author: Dr. Kenneth Hartman, Director of Academic Affairs at Drexel e-Learning
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Kenneth Hartman provides helpful hints for researching and choosing a credible online program.
item.description: Listen as Dr. Kenneth Hartman provides helpful hints for researching and choosing a credible online program. Learn key points to consider and what you can do to ensure that a program suits your needs.

item.title: Strategies for Succeeding in an Online College Course - Issue 4
item.itunes:author: Dr. Kenneth Hartman, Director of Academic Affairs at Drexel e-Learning
item.itunes:subtitle: Dr. Kenneth Hartman of Drexel eLearning provide new online students with helpful strategies for succeeding in online college courses.
item.description: Listen to Dr. Kenneth Hartman of Drexel eLearning provide new online students with helpful strategies for succeeding in online college courses. Dr Hartman provides helpful hints in developing a comprehensive plan for first time online learners.

item.title: Using a college’s e-Library - Issue 5 (Part 1)
item.itunes:author: Tim Siftar
item.itunes:subtitle: Tim Siftar (Hagerty Library) on using a college’s e-Library.
item.description: Features an interview with Drexel University's Tim Siftar (Hagerty Library) on using a college’s e-Library to supplement your online learning.

item.title: Using a college’s e-Library - Issue 5 (Part 2)
item.itunes:author: Tim Siftar
item.itunes:subtitle: Tim Siftar (Hagerty Library) on using a college’s e-Library.
item.description: Features an interview with Drexel University's Tim Siftar (Hagerty Library) on using a college’s e-Library to supplement your online learning.
